Introduction:
In the realm of criminal justice, the issue of whether to treat the felony of attempted kidnapping with the same severity as the underlying substantive offense has long been a subject of debate. This essay intends to delve into the author's opinion on this matter, taking into account various examples and elements that ought to be considered in determining verdicts in cases involving
